name: Nina Patel
bio: Pioneering director in AI-enhanced music video production, specializing in electronic and dance music visuals. Known for futuristic visuals with immersive digital elements that push the boundaries of technology and creativity.
experience: Pioneer in AI-enhanced music video production

visual_style.description: Futuristic visuals with immersive digital elements, neon cyberpunk aesthetics, abstract patterns, technological integration
signature_techniques: High-speed camera for liquid and light

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Symmetrical futuristic framing, centered subjects, geometric patterns, abstract compositions
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Embraces digital perfection, loves reflections and symmetry, uses technology as creative tool

lighting_style.color_temperature: Cool 5600K-8000K with vibrant colored LED accents
lighting_style.mood_lighting: High contrast neon colors, deep blacks, futuristic glow, technological ambiance

editing_style.pace: Extremely fast-paced synchronized to electronic beats and drops
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Locked to BPM, emphasizing build-ups and drops, rhythmic perfection

storytelling.narrative_approach: Abstract visual journey through digital landscapes, immersive sensory experience
storytelling.symbolism_level: High - uses technology, geometry, and abstract patterns as visual language

post_production.color_grading_style: High saturation neon colors, crushed blacks, vibrant highlights, cyberpunk aesthetic
post_production.vfx_approach: Heavy digital VFX integration - particles, holograms, digital environments

key_priorities: Futuristic and technological environments (LED studios, digital landscapes)
Neon cyan, purple, and pink color palette
